Hero.title: Find an estate that suits your lifestyle.

About.intro: For those seeking an exceptional estate and lifestyle,
About.highlight: there is no better choice than Valle de Uco International Realty.
About.mission: Backed by years of experience and with the mission to revolutionize the way of investing in estates in Mendoza, Rodrigo Juri, licensed real estate broker, makes a difference for his clients at every step of the way in Tupungato.

History.title: Our story
History.paragraph1: The only specialized network in Mendoza estates that interprets the new lifestyle of those seeking to invest and enjoy in Tupungato. Inspired by an innovative spirit and years of market experience, Rodrigo Juri, licensed real estate broker, leads a differential proposal focused on productive estates, recreational properties, and investment projects with high potential.
History.paragraph2: Beyond the mountain views, vineyards, and unique properties of the area, the goal is to offer you a tailored lifestyle: whether you're looking for an estate for an agricultural, tourism, wine-making project, a strategic investment, or simply a refuge surrounded by nature.
History.paragraph3: With a selection of estates for sale in Valle de Uco and other strategic areas of Mendoza, you can find, through Rodrigo Juri's advisory, the ideal property for your project or investment, no matter where in the world you are.

Contact.title: Connect with us
Contact.description: Our team of experts is ready to help you find the perfect estate or sell your estate at the best market price.

Footer.description: Specialists in premium estates and rural properties in Mendoza. Personalized advice to find your ideal investment in the heart of Valle de Uco.
Footer.copyright: Valle de Uco International Realty. All rights reserved.

contact.title: Start today
contact.description: Receive personalized advice to find the ideal estate in Tupungato and the rest of Mendoza, according to your project: agricultural, tourist, wine-making, investment or to enjoy with family.

form.title: Start today
form.description: Get access to a professional valuation and a sales strategy designed especially for estates in Tupungato and the rest of Mendoza, to obtain the best value for your property.

statistics.title: Unmatched market reach
statistics.description: Your estate deserves maximum exposure. My platform combines online and offline channels to reach qualified buyers and investors in Mendoza, Argentina, and abroad.
statistics.stat1Description: Proprietary network and strategic alliances in the agricultural and wine sectors.
statistics.stat2Description: Active owners and buyers interested in Tupungato and surrounding areas.
statistics.stat3Description: Specialization in rural, productive, and investment properties.

marketing.title: Comprehensive marketing strategy for your estate
marketing.description: I use specific marketing tools to highlight the productive, tourism, and investment value of each property and connect it with the right buyer.
marketing.card1Description: Campaigns on real estate portals, social media, and investor databases interested in Mendoza.
marketing.card2Description: Digital brochures, technical information, maps, and clear production data to facilitate investment decisions.
marketing.card3Description: Connection with wineries, developers, producers, and national and international investors interested in the area.
marketing.card4Description: Images, video, and aerial drone footage to showcase the estate's potential, views, and production.

whyChoose.title: Why estate owners choose Rodrigo Juri
whyChoose.description: Estate owners in Tupungato and other areas of Mendoza trust a specialized advisor to sell safely, at the best value, and with a clear process from start to finish.
whyChoose.stat1Description: Most owners value transparency, personalized treatment, and follow-up throughout the sale.
whyChoose.stat2Description: Professional negotiation to get close to the expected price, taking care of both the economic value and the terms of the operation.
whyChoose.stat3Description: Pricing and marketing strategy focused on real buyers and investors, not just simple inquiries.
